name: Saddle Up Barrel Racing
description:
Welcome to Saddle Up!

Experience the thrill and realism of buying and training your own horse to win records and become a rodeo champ!

Buy and care for up to a dozen horses. Feed, brush and bond with your horse in a realistically designed 3D environment.

Turn and burn in an intense Barrel Race.
Test your horse's agility and weave through poles to win a race by a fraction of a second in Pole Bending.

So Download Now, Saddle Up, and test your skills!
